attributes.action: require all universities in England and Wales to issue receipts to their students upon formal submission of coursework.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most universities in England and Wales issue their students with a receipt for coursework which is formally submitted.  However, there are still some universities who fail to offer this facility.  This can leave students vulnerable to scrutiny should their coursework be lost after it has been submitted.  Offering a receipt upon submission of coursework would eliminate this problem and ensure universities provide greater accountability to their students.
